episodes.title: ‘I Grew Up in a Cult’: Clare Heath McIvor Exposes City Builders Church
episodes.description:
The Victorian inquiry into cults has exposed shocking allegations against the City Builders Church, including claims of gay conversion therapy, victims being told not to go to police, and pressure to keep pregnancies resulting from rape.

In this powerful interview, Clare Heath-McIvor — the daughter of Pastor Brian Heath — shares her personal experience growing up inside what she calls a cult, and why she’s speaking out.

Hosted by Rob McKnight, this McKnight Tonight exclusive shines a light on the growing concern over religious extremism and control in Australia.

🕒 Chapters:
0:00 – Introduction
0:42 – What Happened Inside City Builders Church
2:10 – Clare’s Childhood in the Church
3:55 – Gay Conversion & Silencing Victims
6:40 – Why Clare Finally Spoke Out

#McKnightTonight #CityBuildersChurch #ClareHeathMcIvor #religion
